metadata.title: CVE-2022-0561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Null source pointer passed as an argument to memcpy() function withinTIFFFetchStripThing() in tif_dirread.c in libtiff versions from 3.9.0 to4.3.0 could lead to Denial of Service via crafted TIFF file. For users thatcompile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit eecb0712.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
